title: why is every yasuo on my team a fucking r%%%%% 1000000000% of the time
body: but oh the enemy yasuos are fucking high elo smurfs. its not just bad games. ITS EVERY fucking game i get a yasuo hes mentally challenged. oh oh oh oh oh oh oh  its only is s2. ONLY in this shit division do i have issues with every fucking game. s3? easy to get to s2. s2? oh lets give you the most braindead players in the fucking game. YES PLEASE RIOT.

replies.body: I have this problem, but with Kha'zix. The Kha'zix players I get in games tend to be the most braindead feeders I see. It's a shame because he seems to be unreasonably popular in silver.
